requirements.description: Your first-party relationship with your user means that, as between you and us, you are better situated to provide notice to your users of the data collection and disclosure practices involved in your use of our Services and to obtain their consent.

type.summary: Responsibility for User Notification and Consent

requirements.description: As a condition of using our Services, you must provide appropriate notices to users of your application(s) about data collection and use practices related to your use of our Services.

You must obtain their consent to the Services' data collection and use, including use to reward users for their engagement with Campaign Content (for incentivized campaign types) and use for behaviorally targeted online advertising.

type.summary: Obtaining User Consent for Data Use
